quantitySync.title: Quantity Management
quantitySync.description: Sync and verify available product quantities
quantitySync.noChanges: No changes needed. All product quantities are correct
quantitySync.syncError: Error occurred while syncing product quantities
quantitySync.instruction1: Use this function when you find quantity discrepancies
quantitySync.instruction2: System will check active rentals and adjust quantities accordingly
quantitySync.instruction3: Run sync regularly to maintain data accuracy
